ERROR_CODE_BAD_CREDENTIALS: Unknown combination of e-mail address and password.
ERROR_CODE_CHARACTER_NAME_TOO_LONG: Character name too long. (30 characters max.)
ERROR_CODE_CHARACTER_NAME_TOO_SHORT: Character name too short. (3 characters min.)
ERROR_CODE_EMAIL_ALREADY_IN_USE: E-mail address is already in use.
ERROR_CODE_MISSING_ROLE: You are not allowed to perform this operation.
ERROR_CODE_PASSWORD_TOO_LONG: Password is too long. (30 characters max.)
ERROR_CODE_PASSWORD_TOO_SHORT: Password is too short. (6 characters min.)
ERROR_CODE_ROLE_ALREADY_EXISTS: The user already has the selected role.
ERROR_CODE_ROLE_NOT_FOUND: The user does not have the selected role.
